item.title: Building static blog/website using Hugo
item.description: Recently i have set-up this blog using Hugo. I was able to do it over a weekend. It was a fun & rewarding experience. item.title: Docker 101
item.description: WHAT IS DOCKER ? To put it simply, Docker is a way of packing & distributing software. WHY DO WE NEED DOCKER ? Let’s say your are building a Python application using Django. You can provide list of Python dependencies/packages needed for the project inside requirements.txt file. Let’s say one of the dependency is celery. For celery to work it will need a backend ( let’s say we are using rabbitmq as backend for celery)
